article.title: The scaling properties and the multiple derivative of Legendre polynomials

multiple_choice_question.text: This formula shows that a scaled Legendre polynomial P<sub>n</sub>(Î»x) can be expressed as:
choices: A sum of multiple derivatives of Legendre polynomials.
A single Legendre polynomial of a different degree.
A product of Legendre polynomials of different degrees.

multiple_choice_question.text: This formula expresses the k<sup>th</sup> derivative of a Legendre polynomial P<sub>n</sub>(x) as:
choices: A single Legendre polynomial of a different degree.
A product of Legendre polynomials of different degrees.
